meanings.definition: To give all or a large part of one's time or resources to a person, activity, or cause.
meanings.sent1: She devotes her weekends to volunteering at the animal shelter.
meanings.sent2: He devotes hours each day to practicing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The little girl devotes all her allowance to buying toys.
meanings.sent4: His heart devotes itself entirely to helping those in need.
meanings.sent5: The artist devotes every brushstroke to creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To commit oneself to a particular task or purpose.
meanings.sent1: They devotes themselves to studying for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent2: She devotes her energy to improving her skills.
meanings.sent3: The team devotes all their efforts to winning the championship.
meanings.sent4: His mind devotes all its focus to solving the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The student devotes every moment to understanding the lesson.

meanings.definition: To dedicate or consecrate something to a deity or sacred purpose.
meanings.sent1: The priest devotes the new church altar to the patron saint.
meanings.sent2: They devotes the sacred text to the memory of their ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The ceremony devotes the temple bell to bringing peace to the village.
meanings.sent4: The monks devotes their prayers to the well-being of all living beings.
meanings.sent5: The ritual devotes every chant to honoring the divine spirits.
